ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T23:02:47 [Issue ID 4000-211625] urn:comicvine:4000-211625 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 21:01:35. [Issue ID 750748]
ComicInfo.Summary: The final chapter of the Super Sidekick Sleepover Slaughter arrives with more superhero bloodshed than...well, about the same as the average superhero comic these days. Cassie and Vlad must stop the super-empowering device called the Godbox before it falls into the wrong hands. If you think hockey-masked killers are bad, wait until the cape-and-cowl set starts killing people!
ComicInfo.Title: Super Sleepover Sidekick Slaughter! pt 3
